attributes.action: Revoke Article 50 and Call a General Election
attributes.background: The principal leave campaigns broke the law with regards to overspending and campaign coordination. The leave vote must then be ruled invalid. Pursuing Brexit would be an insult to democracy. Article 50 must be revoked and a general election must be called so the parties can update their manifestos.

rejection.details:
To revoke article 50:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/226509

To have a general election:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
